item.title: Nebula v1.4.14
item.sparkle:description:
Nebula v1.4.15 introduces new features, bug fixes, and improvements.
- Added new 'Servers Available' tag on servers to know which games still has available servers which can be refreshed with 'Refresh' button
- Added CloudSave size warnings to let you know when CloudSaves are too big and unstable
- Fixed CloudSave limit bug
- Fixed "Multiple Device detected" network bug and improved user in-game verification process
- Fixed other minor UI and system bugs
- Optimixed UI for listing CloudSave and revisions
